description: Retrieves the current state and results for an active session of an Amazon Q App.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Q App session to retrieve.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Q App session.

nested_items.name: sessionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Q App session.

nested_items.name: sessionName
nested_items.description: The name of the Q App session.

nested_items.name: appVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Q App used for the session.

nested_items.name: latestPublishedAppVersion
nested_items.description: The latest published version of the Q App used for the session.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the Q App session.

nested_items.name: cardStatus
nested_items.description: The current status for each card in the Q App session.

nested_items.name: currentState
nested_items.description: The current state of the card.

nested_items.name: currentValue
nested_items.description: The current value or result associated with the card.

nested_items.name: submissions
nested_items.description: A list of previous submissions, if the card is a form card.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The data submitted by the user.

nested_items.name: submissionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the submission.

nested_items.name: timestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the card is submitted.

nested_items.name: userIsHost
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the current user is the owner of the Q App data collection session.
